OrgName.entry: MUSLIM ASSOCIATION OF BRITAIN (MAB) - SHEFFIELD BRANCH

Desc.entry: Dedicated to serving society through promoting Islam in its spiritual teachings, ideological and civilising concepts, also moral and human values. Works in partnership with other organisations, civic institutions and political bodies to achieve the positive integration of Muslims into the wider society. Supports just causes in the world. Also contributes to outreach to people of other faiths and encourages dialogue and co-operation between religions. MAB is a founder member of Mosques and Imams National Advisory Body (MINAB) which seeks to develop and improve working standards in mosques and Islamic centres as well as training Imams and developing their skills. Teaches Arabic and Qu'ranic classes for children aged 6 years and over. Also has a youth programme and women's activities.
